Contact Daniel

If you’d like to work with me, or just fancy a chat, there are a variety of ways to get in touch, such as:

Tweeting me on Twitter (@DanToml), or IM’ing on Skype (DanToml), or mailing me via e-mail (DanielTomlinson@me.com), and I’ll try to reply as soon as possible.
